General.Name: PannErgy Nyrt.
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: PannErgy Nyrt. generates and sells thermal and electric power through the exploitation of geothermal resources in Hungary. It operates in Miskolc, Gyor, Szentlorinc and Berekfürdo in Hungary. The company was founded in 1922 and is based in Budapest, Hungary.
